data.name: Link The Cubes
data.detailed_description:
Link The Cubes is a relaxing Top-Down puzzle game with cute little cubes. Your goal is to get all the cubes to their target platforms.

Gameplay


There is always one main cube that you can move through the level. You can use the space bar to connect to the other cubes in the level and move all cubes together. If one of the connected cubes is blocked, the other cubes cannot move either. When a cube reaches a target platform, it happily falls asleep. ðŸ˜´



When all the cubes have fallen asleep, you move on to the next level!

Features


  • Control one or more cubes at the same time
  • Reach all target platforms to get to the next level
  • Challenging puzzle rooms with different obstacles
  • Cute little cubes with character

Special Thanks to our GMTK Jam 2021 Team


  • Sebastian Frey
  • Patrick Stengel

data.short_description: Link The Cubes is a relaxing puzzle game with cute little cubes. Solve the puzzle levels by connecting the cubes and moving them to the goal.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 1060 Gt or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
